roleset.name: to pay frequent visits to
roleset.note: FREQUENT-V NOTES: Frames file for 'frequent' based on survey of sentences in the WSJ corpus. (from frequent.01-v predicate notes)

example.name: transitive
example.text: The former $ 3 million-a-year [*U*] lobbyist now frequents shelters for the homeless and devotes a third of his time [*-1]counseling other recovering alcoholics .

roleset.name: occurring often
roleset.note: FREQUENT-J NOTES: Added by Julia based on BOLT. (from frequent.01-j)

example.name: arg1
example.text: Not sure i s call it lonely but solitary . I 'm a freak . Do n't really get lonely per se . I do know that when I study on my own it s pretty frequent that it comes up in clinic and it pays dividends
example.arg: when I study on my own
that it comes up in clinic and pays dividends
